item.title: New module: system/btop version 1.4.4
item.description: Resource monitor that shows usage and stats for processor, memory, disks, network and processes.

item.description: Dorado is a high-performance, easy-to-use, open source basecaller for Oxford Nanopore reads.

item.description: BookNLP, a natural language processing pipeline for books
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/libsndfile version 1.2.2
item.description: Libsndfile is a C library for reading and writing files containing sampled sound (such as MS Windows WAV and the Apple/SGI AIFF format) through one standard library interface.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/opus version 1.5.2
item.description: Opus is a totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/mpg123 version 1.33.0
item.description: The mpg123 distribution contains a real time MPEG 1.0/2.0/2.5 audio player/decoder for layers 1,2 and 3 (most commonly MPEG 1.0 layer 3 aka MP3), as well as re-usable decoding and output libraries.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-pertpy version 1.0.0_py312
item.description: Perturbation Analysis in the scverse ecosystem.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/py-pydeseq2 version 0.5.2_py312
item.description: A Python implementation of the DESeq2 pipeline for bulk RNA-seq DEA.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/py-ott-jax version 0.5.0_py312
item.description: Optimal transport tools implemented with the JAX framework, to solve large scale matching problems of any flavor.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-anndata version 0.11.1_py312
item.description: anndata is a Python package for handling annotated data matrices in memory and on disk, positioned between pandas and xarray.

item.title: New module: devel/claude-code version 1.0.43
item.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows.
